altTitles.en: I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor

altTitles.es-la: Regrese como un chaman de clase FFF

description.en:
Ma Jinsung was once a top-ranked player in Arsia Chronicle, but he was brutally killed by his trusted leader. After that, he thought he'd wake up in his room... not 10 years in the past! 

Now, prepared to exact his revenge, he jumps right back into the game. But this time, his job class is voodooist, and he gets bonuses for killing other players. The only downside -  if he dies in the game, he dies in real life.

Can Jinsung get his revenge without causing too much carnage? Don't bet on it...

title.en: Hanazono-kun to Kazoe-san no Fukakai na Houkago

altTitles.en: Hanazono and Kazoe's Bizarre After School Get Together
Hanazono and Kazoe's Bizarre After School Rendezvous

altTitles.ja: 花園君と数さんの不可解な放課後

description.en:
Kazoe, a girl sheltered from perverse content, and Hanazono, a boy brought up in a family that lives off of the perverse. As Kazoe is finally unable to restrain her curiosity, she turns to Hanazono for help.  
  
This is the story of the two engaging in high intensity consensual knowledge sharing.

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home, My Family Was Ruined
I Regressed to My Ruined Family
When I Returned, My Family Was Ruined

description.en:
I was born as the oldest of a renowned swordsman family, and became stronger faster than anyone.

Yet, I could not stop the dragons, a great disaster that had appeared on the continent.

I closed my eyes in my final moments, thinking everything was over.

I really thought it was over…

But when I opened my eyes, I was back in the past.

A past that was very different from the world I knew.

“What? Is this really my body? Why don’t I have any mana?”

“Where did the castle go? Why’s there only a wooden house left?”

“…What? The dragons and humans made a non-aggression pact?”

A family that had fallen and was on the brink of ruin.

A family whose writing of divination had vanished.

And a body in which no mana could be found!

“…I’ll have to keep myself busy from now on.”

The great hero of a renowned swordsman family.

He is back in the past, in a ‘parallel world’.

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

description.en: An orphan named Raul was taken in by the vampire Rose. Raul worked hard for Rose's sake, and as a result, he became incredibly muscular. This is the story of Raul, now buff and strong, and Rose, the eternally youthful vampire, enjoying their fun daily life together!

500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.

description.en: A series of Umineko When They Cry anthology manga published by Ichijinsha with 5 total volumes.

Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Prince’s hobbies,
Despite that, he doesn’t give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins.

장원에 급제하여 입궁한 학사 운현.
황태자의 취미생활을 전담하는 초라하고 처량한 신세를 한탄하지만,
그럼에도 포기하지 않고 최선을 다해 무공을 익힌다.
그러던 운현은 갑자기 무림을 제패하기 위해 붓을 드는데?!

젊은 나이에 장원에 급제한 학사의 숨겨진 이야기가 시작된다.

description.en: A certain summer day, as the cicadas sing loudly. A man with no money and no place to belong tries to end his life, however is unable to take the last step. While wavering between life and death, he sees a gourmet food program on television, and realising he's never once eaten crab in his life decides that "For my last day on this Earth, I'll eat crab". Settings his sights on the wife who lives in a high-class neighbourhood that he happened across in a library, he forces his way into her home. And thus, he demands money from her, however… things go in an unexpected direction.

altTitles.en: A Woman Who Abandoned Her Face for Revenge

altTitles.vi: Vì Hận Tái Sinh ~Người phụ nữ vì phục thù mà từ bỏ gương mặt của mình~

description.en:
A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
description.ja:
いじめによってすべてを奪われた女が別人に生まれ変わり、地獄の復讐に身を投じる！

昭和20年、太平洋戦争が終わりかけていた時代、樺太（からふと）で生まれ育った少女・市村ハナは、醜い容姿のため女学校で凄惨ないじめを受けていた。いじめのリーダー格は大会社の令嬢・高島津絢子。彼女によって泥棒の濡れ衣を着せられたハナは、退学に追い込まれてしまう。やがてソ連軍が空襲を開始し、樺太から北海道へ逃れる船に乗り込んだハナ一家だったが、いじめグループによって船から追い出されてしまい……。
description.vi:
Một cô gái với cuộc đời bị lấy đi tất cả mọi thứ do bị bắt nạt, vu oan đã tái sinh thành một người khác và cô quyết định trả thù tất cả những ai đã góp phần đẩy cuộc đời mình vào bước đường cùng!
Ichimura Hana, một cô gái sinh ra và lớn lên ở Karafuto, bị bắt nạt dã man tại một trường nữ sinh vì ngoại hình xấu xí của mình. Cầm đầu nhóm bắt nạt cô là Takashimazu Ayako, thiên kim tiểu thư của công ty sản xuất giấy lớn nhất Karafuto thời bấy giờ. Sau một lần bị vu cáo là kẻ trộm, Hana đã bị đuổi học.
Một thời gian sau, trong một cuộc di tản bởi trận không kích của quân Liên Xô, gia đình Hana đáng ra đã lên được một con tàu để thoát khỏi Karafuto đến Hokkaido, nhưng cả nhà cô đã bị xua đuổi khỏi tàu bởi chính sự vu cáo của bè lũ bắt nạt đó...

description.en: Digital colored version of Akira Toriyama's original best selling manga

title.en: The Possesive Tyrant and His Sleepy Cat

altTitles.ko: 매일 밤 집착폭군과 잠드는 고양이가 되었다

altTitles.pt-br: O tirano possessivo e a gata sonolenta

altTitles.en: I Became a Cat That Sleeps with an Obsessive Tyrant Every Night

altTitles.zh: 占有欲强的暴君和他的磕睡小猫

description.en:
I've found myself trapped in a mature-rated novel as a cursed cat, whose mere existence is believed to be harmful to the empire. This place has killed every cat in every alley all because of one prophecy...
The moment anyone finds me will be my last moment in this life.
"What's this?"
Before I could even think of escaping, the male lead, who's fated to become a mad tyrant, effortlessly snatches me up.
description.pt-br: Eu me vi presa em um romance adulto como uma gata amaldiçoada, cuja mera existência é considerada prejudicial ao império. Este lugar matou todos os gatos em todos os becos, tudo por causa de uma profecia… O momento em que alguém me encontrar será meu último momento nesta vida. “O que é isso?” Antes que eu pudesse pensar em escapar, o protagonista masculino, que está fadado a se tornar um tirano louco, me agarra sem esforço.

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

title.en: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword

altTitles.en: The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius

altTitles.ru: От нерадивого аристократа до усердного гения

altTitles.ja: 怠惰公子、努力の天才になる

description.en:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, “the lazy lord”. Yet, in spite of others’ jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his life’s trajectory takes a complete turn...

---
- [Alternative English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation (Webtoons)](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/thelazylord/list?title_no=3168)
- [Official French Translation (Webtoons)](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword/list?title_no=3675)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Line)](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001508)
description.fr: Irene Perreira est un garçon qui dort pour s’enfuir de la réalité. Les gens se moquent de lui, en l’appelant 'bon à rien' , mais il n'a aucune envie de changer. Jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, il rêva d'un épéiste... C'était un rêve d'un homme sans talent qui a entraîné ses mouvements à l'épée pendant des décennies.
description.ja: 誰も期待していなかった一族の怠け者、アイルーンパレイラがついに剣を手に取る。
description.ko:
잠을 도피처로 삼아 온 소년 아이른 파레이라.
사람들은 그를 나태 공자라 부르며 조롱했지만 그는 변할 생각이 없었다.
어느 날 어느 검사의 꿈을 꾸기 전까지는...
그것은 그저 묵묵히 수십 년간 검을 휘두르며 단련하는 한 재능 없는 사내에 관한 꿈이었다.
description.ru:
Юный Айрон Парейра сделал свой мир грёз убежищем от боли трагедии прошлого. Людей забавляло это, они подняли его на смех и прозвали нерадивым аристократом. Однако подобное отношение никак не задевало нашего героя необходимостью меняться.
Так бы всё и продолжалось, не повстречай он во сне бездарного юношу, который тридцать семь лет подряд обучался владению мечом, да так и умер с оружием в руках.
description.zh-hk: 家族中的懶惰蟲終於拿起了劍！將睡覺視為逃避方法的少年艾倫．帕雷拉，即使人們都嘲笑他為懶惰公子，他依然不願改變，直到有天他夢見了一位數十年間不斷揮劍鍛練的無才男子...

altTitles.fr: À la tombée de la nuit

description.en: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
description.fr:
**À la tombée de la nuit** 

La joyeuse et énergique Chika, le timide et silencieux Waya. Ces deux-là, qui sont le jour et la nuit, discutent chaque mercredi soir devant une supérette. À la tombée de la nuit, il se rapproche peu à peu. Une histoire d'amour de jeunesse !
description.pt-br: Chika é uma garota alegre e divertida, Waya é um garoto tímido e gentil. Os dois opostos se falam apenas na loja de conveniência na quarta-feira. Uma história de amor juvenil onde eles diminuem a distância lentamente durante a noite!

description.en:
Two girls who want to become idols are entering into their long dreamed school—Kiraboshi-juku—Kiraboshi Nadeshiko and her close friend Mangetsu Sakurako. These two are so close that despite both being girls, they're often compared to a married couple by people around them.  
  
And so begins their life in the dormitory as roommates. However, on their first night, an unusual, illicit impulse strikes Nadeshiko…

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトの元アイドルが、とにかく挙動不審なんです。

altTitles.en: The Idol Girl in My Class Is Acting Suspiciously

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Idol Bishoujo ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin nan desu

description.en: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
description.ja: 高校進学を機にアイドルを引退した三枝さんは、容姿端麗かつ頭脳明晰。いつも明るくて人当たりも良く、学校で一番の人気者だ。しかし、そんな高嶺の花である三枝さんのとある一面を卓也は知っている。今日もバイト先のコンビニに現れる、怪しげな変装をした挙動不審な女性――。彼女はどう見てもあの三枝さんで…!?

altTitles.fr: La bête de compagnie de l'archiduchesse
La bête de compagnie de la grand-duchesse

altTitles.es: La mascota de la gran duquesa

altTitles.vi: Thú Cưng Của Nữ Đại Công Tước

description.en:
The empire's archduchess Rosalin has a mysterious new lover, Fenrir, a lowborn shape-shifting anthromorph. However, in a world that separates them by class, their love didn’t bloom easily. Turning a blind eye to the injustices of the empire, Rosalin showed no interest in anyone but herself, and having never known his parents or even his own name, Fenrir trusted no one. In a society full of prejudice and hate for their love, can this unlikely couple overcome the odds against them? 

---
Grand Duchess Rosalind Idris Apeluden, the current emperor’s only half-sister. She received a beautiful slave as a gift from her friend. Unable to release the wounded prisoner, Rosalind gave him the name Fenrir and nursed him by her side. Fenrir, who begins to open up to Rosalind after a while, and begins to make her his only companion in life.

---

description.fr:
L'archiduchesse Rosaline Idris Apeluden, le seule demi-sœur de l'empereur actuel. Elle reçoit en cadeau de son amie intime un magnifique esclave sauvage. Rosaline, incapable de se séparer de son prisonnier blessé, lui donne le nom de Fenrir et prend soin d'elle à ses côtés. Son Fenrir, qui commence à ouvrir son cœur à sa Rosaline, ne tarde pas à la considérer comme sa seule et unique compagne dans sa vie.

---

현 황제의 유일한 동복 누이이자 대공 로잘린 이드리스 아펠루덴. 그녀는 친하게 지내던 부인에게 아름다운 수인 노예를 선물받는다. 상처입은 수인을 내치지 못한 로잘린은 그에게 펜리르라는 이름을 주며 곁에 두고 보살핀다. 차츰 로잘린에게 마음을 열기 시작한 펜리르는 어느새 그녀를 인생의 단 하나뿐인 반려로 각인하게 되는데…….

年轻力壮的兽人，即是大公女今夜的赠礼。对兽人所有的偏见在此刻一一被化解，原来爱上曾经讨厌的东西，竟也能令人这么欢乐呢？

description.en: During the era of space exploration, mankind is at war against monsters of unknown origin. The battle is grim, and the future looks bleak. Amidst the chaos, mankind plays their last hand. It's time for the Knights to step into the fray and turn the tide of this war.
Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

description.en: An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler, as they go through their high school life, sitting next to each other in class!
description.pt-br: Uma relação improvável floresce. Será que opostos se atraem? Ou suas diferenças os separarão? Acompanhe a história da garota gótica chamada Ophelia e do popular jogador de futebol americano Tyler, enquanto passam por sua vida escolar, sentados um ao lado do outro na sala de aula!

description.en: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Date Omito.

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

description.en:
One day, a strange transfer student appears before Tsubaki. Urabe Mikoto is an antisocial girl, whose hobby is just sleeping during class-breaks. 
One day, Tsubaki goes to wake her up and accidentally tastes her drool… And gets hooked on that!  
  
After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as the Crazed Heir

altTitles.ja: ハチャメチャ魔教の小教主に転生した件

description.en:
Once a rising martial arts master, Jagak Yang is known as the Ten Strike Finisher due to his ability to defeat any opponent within ten moves. Jagak is also the son of the leader of the Great Martial Alliance, an organization of virtuous martial arts sects. His future leadership over the martial arts world seems all but assured -- that is, until he is assassinated by jealous rivals! Jagak is reincarnated into the body of Cheonso Ma, the playboy second-in-command of the evil Shining Light Cult. Can Jagak remain true to his principles despite his new life on the dark side?

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/reincarnated-as-an-unruly-heir/list?title_no=3308)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chongshengbuliangshaojiaozhu/list?title_no=1850)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001695)
description.fr: Yang Ja-Gak fut empoisonné pendant la guerre politique des sectes. Alors qu’il pensait être mort, il réalisa alors qu’il était maintenant dans le corps d’une autre personne. Il se rendit compte qu’il faisait partie du Culte Démoniaque et que l’art martial qu’il maîtrisais maintenant était celui du Dieu Céleste Démoniaque et que le propriétaire du corps dans lequel il est est l’héritier fou qui ne faisait que convoiter les femmes. Pourquoi fallait-il que ça tombe sur lui ?! Et pourquoi est-ce qu’il a atterrit dans son corps à lui ?!
description.ja: 武林の政争に巻き込まれ毒殺された古今随一の奇才、楊子閣。 死んだに違いないと思ったが、目が覚めると自分の魂が違う者の体に宿っていることに気がつく。自分がいるのは魔教、体得した武功は天魔神功であり、この体の持ち主は女性を弄び悪霊よりもひどい行いをする不成者の小教主。 よりによってなぜ魔教なのか？
description.ko:
무림의 정쟁에 휘말려 독살당한 고금 제일의 기재, 양자각.
분명 죽은 줄로 알았으나 정신을 차리게 되고, 자신이 다른 사람의 몸에 들어와 있다는 것을 알게 된다.
알고 보니 자신이 있는 곳은 마교, 익힌 무공은 천마신공,
이 몸의 주인은 여색을 탐하고 악귀보다 더한 짓을 하는 망나니 소교주?
왜 하필이면 마교에다 이 사람인가!?
description.ru: Ян Чагак, убитый ядом во время политических войн в Муриме, после смерти очнулся в неизвестном месте и вскоре выяснил, что находится в демоническом культе, а изучаемые им техники - высшее искусство владыки демонов, к тому же тело принадлежит безумному наследнику, жаждущему женщин.
description.zh:
武林盟主之子成魔教教主！
是正义致远还是步入邪途？
扬子阁，被称为旷世奇才的他意外在武林夺位战中被毒杀身亡。没想到一睁眼，自己的魂魄竟进入了他人的身躯。不仅如此，发誓一生要行侠仗义的他居然入住了魔教之地，学的武功也是魔教神功，而且他自己变成了一个贪图女色，无恶不作的魔教少教主?!为什么偏偏要重生为魔教之人?!
description.zh-hk: 被捲入武林政治鬥爭的古今第一奇才，梁自覺，明明以為死了，醒來卻發現自己在別人身體裡。了解後才知道，自己所在的地方是魔教，練成的武功則是天魔神功。這身體的主人還是個愛好女色，比惡鬼還可惡的不良小教主？為什麼偏偏是在魔教的這個人啊？

description.en:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
description.hu: Hestia, a főhősnőnk a kedvenc regényének egy gazdag mellékszereplőjeként ébred egy nap. Rajongóként legelső dolga, hogy nemesi címet vásároljon magának annak érdekében, hogy az imádott drágaságát, a regény second male lead-jét, Caelust láthassa az arisztokrata bálokon. Hestia úgy dönt, csak külső szemlélő lesz, nem avatkozik bele a cselekményszálba. A regény eredeti befejezését követő évben azonban olyan váratlan dolog történik Caelus-szal, ami Hestiát mégis cselekvésre készteti, hogy a bias-a elkerülhesse a tragikus befejezést.1
description.ko:
"내 최애를 살려내!"
N회차 정주행할 만큼 애정하던 로판 소설에 빙의한 헤스티아,
엑스트라 of 엑스트라에 빙의한 덕에 주인공들을 직관하고 드디어 맞이한 작품의 엔딩!
엔딩 후 현실로 돌아가게 될 거란 예상은 산산조각이 나고,
소설의 엔딩 후 비하인드가 가장 애정하는 캐릭터였던 서브남 카엘루스의 죽음이라는 충격에서 벗어나기도 전에
소설의 엔딩 직후로 회귀하는데…!
그렇다면 이번엔, 내 최애를 지켜내겠어!

title.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E5%8A%8D%E7%8E%8B%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/66)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34782)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

title.en: My Father Has Become a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Pain

altTitles.ja: 父親が美少女になってしまって色々つらい

altTitles.ja-ro: Chichioya ga Bishoujo ni Natte Shimatte Iroiro Tsurai

altTitles.en: My Father Turned into a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Trouble.

altTitles.ru: Мой отец превратился в красивую девушку и это доставляет много хлопот.

description.en: A successful but annoying dad got gender-swapped and become a beautiful girl. Now he has lost his job and has to depend on his son while slowly starting anew.
description.ru:
Однажды в комнату Тацуи заходит красивая девушка... и, к его удивлению оказывается его отцом, который полностью изменился из-за шока от увольнения с работы! !
Хотя он и растерян перед своим отцом, потерявшим все (?), меняются ли мало-помалу отношения между родителем и ребенком, которые раньше были далекими? ? ?
Отец Тацуи потерял все. Тацуя с недоумением смотрит на отца, но расстояние между отцом и сыном постепенно сокращается...?
Отец – это мать, а сын – это отец? Нет, мой лучший друг — мой отец, а мой отец — мой лучший друг...?
Новая комедия TS, которая, несмотря на то, что в социальных сетях ее называют "физиологически невозможной", на самом деле является удивительной историей отца и сына, которая согреет ваше сердце!!!

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

title.en: Today Once Again, the Assassin Cannot Win Against the Girl He Picked Up!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyou mo Ansatsusha wa Hirotta Dorei Shoujo ni Nakanaka Katenai

altTitles.ja: 今日も暗殺者は拾った奴隷少女になかなか勝てない

description.en: An assassin decided to bring home a slave girl from a mission to raise her to be an assassin.

altTitles.ja: カッコいい女の子と12センチの約束

altTitles.en: A Cool Girl and a 12cm Promise

altTitles.es-la: Una chica genial y una promesa de 12 cm

description.en:
A boyish childhood friend grows up to be a super hot girl!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.

The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

altTitles.ja: そんな家族なら捨てちゃえば?

altTitles.vi: Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không?

altTitles.en: Is A Family Like This Worth Keeping?
If It's A Family Like That, Why Don't You Throw It Away?

description.en: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?
description.vi:
Bị vợ và con gái lạnh nhạt, Shinoya Reitaro buộc phải sinh hoạt trong cô độc ngay trong chính căn nhà của mình. 
"Không được bước qua ranh giới, 
Không được ăn uống chung, 
Không được dùng nhà vệ sinh, 
Không được bắt chuyện, 
Không được tạo ra tiếng ồn khi đóng/mở cửa..." 
Cho đến khi anh gặp được một người phụ nữ mà anh không nhớ rõ đã từng gặp qua ở đâu. 
"Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không? Sao anh không vứt quách nó cho rồi đi?" 
Liệu số phận của người đàn ông đang đứng giữa hai sự lựa chọn này rồi sẽ ra sao?

title.en: I've Been Here From the Beginning

altTitles.en: I Was Here From the Beginning
I've Been Here Since the Beginning

altTitles.es: He estado aqui desde el principio

altTitles.ja: 最初からここにいたんですが

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Luôn Ở Đây Ngay Từ Đầu

description.en:
One day, wallflower Kim Hyejin wakes up as her web novel counterpart, Maria, a maid who is ignored by... well, everyone. No one ever really notices her, as if she was a ghost, but Grand Duke Dietrich can't seem to take his eyes off her. Seeing his rival's interest in the girl, Prince Elias resolves to use her for his own advantage in the battle for the throne. As misunderstandings and mystery surrounding Maria grow, she's quickly going from invisible to intriguing to... potentially irresistible!

---
‘Don’t be like that. I feel bad for the maid TT’

I pitied the maid side character forgotten by the author, so I left a comment. The next day, I became that pitiful maid, Maria Mayer. Because of her zero presence, I was called a ghost. So I thought all I needed to do was work hard, but then people started becoming interested in me. The future crown prince and the grand duke!

“I can’t feel your presence at all. Who exactly are you?”

The crown prince, Elias, was interested and yet cautious of Maria and decided to place her beside him.

“There’s nothing I can do if you can’t remember me. I just need to make sure you don’t forget about me from now on.”

I’m sure this is our first meeting, but the grand duke approached me as though he knew me. I-I… I’m just Regular Maid #1 (nickname: Ghost)!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/58345016)

**Official Translations:**

description.fr:
«Ne soyez pas comme ça. Je me sens mal pour la bonne TT»

J’avais pitié du personnage de la servante oublié par l’auteur, alors j’ai laissé un commentaire. Le lendemain, je suis devenue cette pitoyable bonne, Maria Mayer. À cause de sa présence nulle, j’ai été traitée de fantôme. Alors j’ai pensé que tout ce que j’avais à faire était de travailler dur, mais les gens ont commencé à s’intéresser à moi. Le futur prince héritier et le grand-duc!

«Je ne peux pas du tout sentir ta présence. Qui es-tu exactement?»

Le prince héritier, Elias, était intéressé, mais prudent envers Maria et a décidé de la placer à ses côtés.

«Il n’y a rien que je puisse faire si tu ne te souviens pas de moi. Je dois juste m’assurer que tu ne m’oublieras pas à partir de maintenant.»

Je suis sûre que c’est notre première rencontre, mais le grand-duc s’est approché de moi comme s’il me connaissait.

Je-je… Je suis juste la bonne n°1 (surnom: Fantôme)!

---

description.ko:
B 작가와 허쉬하임 작가가 만나 다시 태어난
<처음부터 여기 있었는데요>가 드디어 웹툰으로 런칭!

작가도 잊어버린 엑스트라 하녀가 불쌍해서 댓글을 단 다음 날.
그 불쌍한 하녀, 마리아 메이어에 빙의해 버렸다.

존재감이 0에 수렴하는 탓에 유령이란 칭호까지 획득.
그래도 성실하게 제 일만 하면 되겠거니 생각했는데
그녀에게 관심을 가지는 사람들이 등장하기 시작했다.

그것도 미래의 황태자와 대공이라는 거물들이!

"기척을 느낄 수가 없다니. 네 정체가 도대체 뭐지?"
마리아의 정체에 대해 흥미 반, 경계심 반의 관심으로
제 옆에 두려는 황태자 엘리아스와

"기억이 안 난다니 별수 없죠. 앞으로는 날 잊지 않게 하면 되니까."
처음보는 게 분명한데 다 알고 있다는 듯이
웃으며 접근하는 대공 디트리히.

저, 저……
저는 그냥 평범한 하녀1(특:존재감 없음)일 뿐인데요!

description.pl:
"Nie bądźcie tacy.  Żal mi pokojówki T-T”

 Żal mi było zapomnianej przez autorkę postaci pokojówki, więc zostawiłam komentarz.  Następnego dnia obudziłam się jako ta żałosna pokojówka, Maria Mayer. 
 
Przez jej niemal niewyczuwalną obecność zyskała sobie miano ducha. Pomyślałam więc, że wszystko, co muszę zrobić to po prostu ciężko pracować, jednak nagle ludzie zaczęli mnie zauważać. I to nie kto inny jak następca tronu oraz arcyksiążę!

 „W ogóle nie wyczuwam twojej obecności.  Kim ty właściwie  jesteś?"

 Następca tronu, Elias, był ciekawy, a jednocześnie ostrożny w stosunku do Marii, postanawiając mieć ją na oku. 

 „Nic nie poradzę skoro mnie nie pamiętasz, ale muszę się upewnić, że od teraz już o mnie nie zapomnisz."

 Jestem pewna, że to nasze pierwsze spotkanie, ale arcyksiąże zwaraca się do mnie, jakby mnie znał.  J-Ja… Jestem tylko zwykłą pokojówką nr 1 (pseudonim: Duch)!
description.zh:
永远被忘得一干二净、0%存在感的侍女玛利亚·梅依， 不论侍女长还是同事都不记得她，是个如同幽灵般的存在。 身边的人经常被突然出现的她吓一跳：“你是从什么时候来的？！吓死人啦！” 不会有人理解她的回答：“其实我，一直就在这里…” 但现在有人记住了她！ 甚至一个是将来的皇太子，一个是帝国超人气大公!!

description.pt-br:
No dia em que deixou um comentário online simpatizando com a pobre personagem de um livro, que havia sido esquecida até mesmo pela própria autora, ela de repente acordou no corpo da personagem. Mas, por algum motivo, esse corpo tem uma presença esquecível, de nível zero, e por isso inclusive recebeu o apelido de fantasma do palácio. Tentando fazer o seu melhor numa péssima situação, ela achou que tudo ficaria bem na medida em que fizesse o seu papel com sinceridade e paixão, mas de repente pessoas interessadas em na sua existência começaram a aparecer, incluindo o príncipe e o duque! "Você não tem nenhuma presença? Qual diabos é a sua identidade?" O principe regente Elias está parcialmente interessado, e parcialmente desconfiado da identidade de Maria Mayer, e portanto decidi por mantê-la por perto. Enquanto isso, o duque se aproximou de Maria, agindo como se tivesse conhecimento de todos os segredos em torno de sua identidade, apesar de nunca terem se encontrado antes. E ela? Bom, ela é apenas apenas uma criada, nada mais...

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

God created the Abyss to escape his boredom. Trapped in the hellish Abyss, humanity was on the path to the apocalypse… “Is it over for us… now…” On the brink of humanity’s annihilation, the four strongest survivors tried to prevent it by traveling back in time to the point just before humanity was pulled into the Abyss.

But only one of them could go back to the past. “What’s there to think about? Isn’t it already decided who’s going? The strongest among us, Kang Hansoo.” This is the story of the life of the legendary powerhouse, Kang Hansoo, who returned to save humanity from its doom. Will he be able to save everyone?
description.fr: Dieu a créé l'abîme pour échapper à son ennui. Piégée dans le gouffre infernal, l'humanité était sur le chemin de l'apocalypse... "Est-ce fini pour nous... maintenant..." Au bord de l'anéantissement de l'humanité, les quatre survivants les plus forts ont tenté de l'empêcher en remontant le temps jusqu'au moment où l'humanité a été entraînée dans l'abîme. Mais seul l'un d'entre eux a pu retourner dans le passé. "Qu'est-ce qu'il y a à penser ? N'a-t-on pas déjà décidé qui irait ? Le plus fort d'entre nous, Kang Hansoo." Voici l'histoire de la vie du légendaire Kang Hansoo, qui est revenu pour sauver l'humanité de sa perte. Sera-t-il capable de sauver tout le monde ?
description.ko:
신의 심심함을 만족시키기 위해 시작된 이면세계,
그로 인해 멸망 직전 위기에 처한 인류는 마지막 생존자 중 한 명인 '강한수'를 과거로 보내 미래를 바꾸려 한다.
"너희가 가장 믿어야 할 것은 자신의 능력이다. 쓸모없으면 반드시 버려지기 마련이지"

title.en: I'm Really Not the Child of Luck

altTitles.en: I'm Really Not the Son of Luck

altTitles.es-la: Realmente no soy un hijo de la suerte

description.en: Traveling through the world of immortality, Shen Tian found that he could see the luck and fortune of others around him. With the idea of ​​rubbing the aura of the protagonist of the boss, Shen Tian began to take the initiative to make friends with the children of luck. Later, everyone gradually discovered that no matter who they are, as long as they practice with Shen Tian, ​​they will inevitably encounter great opportunities, and there will be no exceptions! From that day on, Shen Tian became the most popular mascot in the world of immortality.
description.pt-br: Depois de transmigrar para um mundo de cultivação imortal, Shen Tian descobriu que podia ver a sorte e as chances de outras pessoas ao seu redor. Segurando a ideia da auréola do protagonista, Shen Tian começou a fazer amizade com os filhos da sorte. Mais tarde, todos descobriram que não importa quem você seja, desde que você treine com Shen Tian, ​​você inevitavelmente encontrará grandes oportunidades, sem exceção! A partir daquele dia, Shen Tian se tornou o mascote mais popular do mundo da imortalidade.

description.en:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

Though Chichi the cat looks very cute, she has one goal: eradicate humanity and take over the world! She decides to recruit comrades to aid her in her quest, but it looks like world conquest won't be that easy?! 

Follow the adventures of Chichi the tyrant, Dunno the doggo who loves humans, and Kaiser Kang Taeshik, the hard-boiled wild hamster, as they face many hardships on their path to absolute dominion!

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

title.en: If You Can't Kill Me, Love Me

description.en:
A few years ago, the Second Queen Nayla incited a rebellion. The King and the First Queen, Viatan, along with their aides, were all killed. Only Princess Chell, the daughter of Viatan survived.

The Princess, now lives like a ghost, and is known as the Princess of Death.

Along comes Penny, who becomes Chell's personal maid, making her the first maid that serve the Princess after years. However, she's no ordinary maid.

This blunt and clumsy maid is actually an assassin disguised as a maid. Under the orders of Queen Nayla, Penny's final task is to kill the Princess. 

Penny just wants her freedom. She needs to save money to escape and travel far away after she finishes her final task from Queen Nayla.

Unlike the rumours about being the Princess of Death, Penny finds herself inexplicably drawn to the Princess.

Will Penny be able find her way to freedom?

description.en:
At the beginning of the Edo period (1603-1868), when people enjoyed a time of peace, Lord Tokugawa Tadanaga decides to hold a fighting tournament. In the past, matches were fought with wooden swords, but this time real swords will be used. The one-armed Fujiki Gennosuke and the blind Irako Seigen will fight each other in this tournament, even though both of them are disciples of Iwamoto Kogan — known as Japan's greatest swordsman. So begins the story of intertwining fates, conflict, and strange destinies.  
  
Note:  
It's SHOUNEN because it's published in Champion Red, a shounen magazine for late teens+early 20ies

Kim Seojoon, a freshman college student leading a normal daily life, awoke one day to find himself transported into a fantasy world straight out of a webtoon or web novel or something like that. As he began to get excited about potentially having the role of a male lead character, a shocking event unfolded before his eyes—a murder of an imperial family. Consequently, Kim Seojoon found himself imprisoned in the world's prison, 'Gehenna'. Will he be able to navigate the treacherous paths of this unfamiliar world?

title.en: My Sweet Enemy, Thy Name Is Husband

altTitles.pt-br: Casamento Político com um Inimigo Amigável

altTitles.pl: Mój słodki wróg ma imię mojego męża

altTitles.en: Forced Into Wedlock With An Affectionate Enemy
Political Marriage With a Friendly Enemy

description.en:
My husband, my nemesis. Till death do us part.

Canach Riadon — a slave who rose to become the emperor and the man I wed in my first life. Yet our ill-fated marriage left my family murdered and my homeland destroyed at his hands. Now given a second chance, I vow to succeed in this political marriage and save all I love... Or will his love save me first?
description.pl: Canach Riadon - niewolnik, który został cesarzem i mężczyzna, którego poślubiłam w moim pierwszym życiu. Jednak nasze niefortunne małżeństwo sprawiło, że moja rodzina została zamordowana, a moja ojczyzna zniszczona z jego rąk. Teraz, mając drugą szansę, przysięgam odnieść sukces w tym politycznym małżeństwie i ocalić wszystko, co kocham... A może najpierw jego miłość ocali mnie?
description.pt-br:
Meu marido, meu inimigo. Até que a morte nos separe.
Canach Riadon — um escravo que se tornou o Imperador e o homem com quem eu casei em minha primeira vida. Entretanto, nosso casamento mal-fadado resultou na morte da minha família e na destruição da minha terra natal causada por suas mãos. Agora que recebi uma segunda chance, eu juro ser bem sucedida neste casamento político e salvar tudo o que amo... Ou o amor dele me salvará primeiro?

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
